dmca.title: Article DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
by fax



                                                   June 14, 2011

Google, Inc.

Attn: Knol Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

1600 Amphitheatre Parkway

Mountain View, CA 94043



Dear Madam/Sir:

   1. This is a notice of copyright infringement of my article Antonio A.
      Colella, "A Proposed Super Unified Theory," version 40, last edited on
      Jan 31, 2009.  The copyrighted work at issue  is the text that appears
      on http://knol.google.com/k/antonio-colella/a-proposed-super-unified-
      theory/3h4y5c7nj2xo/6#view

   2. Ninety nine percent of my article was blatantly copied, my name
      replaced with Kaka Abel with a date of 2010-06-19. The material that
      is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item #1 is on
      http://blog.163.com/niujiashu@126/blog/static/10029304220105197459173/


   3. My email address is Toncolella@aol.com

   4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material
      described above on the allegedly infringement web pages is not
      authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

   5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
      notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
      authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
      allegedly infringed.

                                                   Sincerely yours,




                                                      Antonio A. Colella

                                                   561 994 6738

                                                   Toncolella@aol.com
